description: Gatling dashboard with parameters: granularity (1s, 5s, ...) and request filter

targets.query: SELECT last("active") FROM "gatling.users" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($g)
SELECT last("active") FROM "gatling.users" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($g)
SELECT last("count")  / $rpsHack FROM "gatling" WHERE ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "simulation", "group1", "group2", "status", "request", "simulation"
SELECT last("count") FROM "gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($g)
SELECT "percentiles50" FROM "gatling" WHERE "request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ok' AND $timeFilter

SELECT min("min") AS "Min", max("max") AS "Max", mean("mean") AS "Mean", percentile("percentiles95", 95) AS "95th pct" FROM "gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'all' AND "request" != 'allRequests') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request"
SELECT last("count") FROM "gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($g)
SELECT "count" FROM "gatling" WHERE "request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ko' AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("count") FROM "gatling" WHERE $timeFilter and "mean" <= 800 and "status" = 'ok' and "request" = 'allRequests'
SELECT sum("count") FROM "gatling" WHERE $timeFilter and "mean" > 800 and "mean" <= 1200 and "status" = 'ok' and "request" = 'allRequests'
SELECT sum("count") FROM "gatling" WHERE $timeFilter and "mean" > 1200 and "status" = 'ok' and "request" = 'allRequests'
SELECT sum("count") FROM "gatling" WHERE $timeFilter and "status" = 'ko' and "request" = 'allRequests'

SELECT "simulation" as "1. simulation", * FROM (  SELECT sum("count") AS "Total" FROM "gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "simulation", "group1", "group2", "request" ) GROUP BY "1. simulation" , "group1", "group2", "request"

SELECT "simulation" as "1. simulation", * FROM ( SELECT sum("count") AS "OK" FROM "gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "simulation", "group1", "group2", "request" ) GROUP BY "1. simulation" , "group1", "group2", "request"

SELECT "simulation" as "1. simulation", * FROM ( SELECT sum("count") AS "KO" FROM "gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "simulation", "group1", "group2", "request") GROUP BY "1. simulation" , "group1", "group2", "request"

SELECT "simulation" as "1. simulation", * FROM ( SELECT min("min") AS "Min", percentile("percentiles50", 50) AS "50th pct", percentile("percentiles75", 75) AS "75th pct", percentile("percentiles95", 95) AS "95th pct", percentile("percentiles99", 99) AS "99th pct", max("max") AS "Max", mean("mean") AS "Mean", stddev("mean") AS "Std Dev" FROM "gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "simulation", "group1", "group2", "request" ) GROUP BY "1. simulation" , "group1", "group2", "request"
SELECT last("count")  / $rpsHack FROM "gatling" WHERE ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "simulation", "group1", "group2", "status", "request", "simulation"
SELECT last("count")  / $rpsHack FROM "gatling" WHERE ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "simulation", "group1", "group2", "status", "request", "simulation"
SELECT "percentiles50" FROM "gatling" WHERE "request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ok' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "count" FROM "gatling" WHERE "request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'all' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Number of requests per second (group by simulation),

targets.query: SELECT "count" FROM "gatling" WHERE "request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'all' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Number of requests per second (group by simulation, status)

targets.query: SELECT last("count")  / $rpsHack FROM "gatling" WHERE ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "simulation", "group1", "group2", "status", "request", "simulation"

panels.title: Script execution intensity (frequency of scripts executed per second)

targets.query: SELECT last("count")  / $rpsHack FROM "gatling" WHERE ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "simulation", "group1", "group2", "status", "request", "simulation"

panels.title: Script execution intensity (frequency of scripts executed per minute)

targets.query: SELECT last("count")  / $rpsHack FROM "gatling" WHERE ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "simulation", "group1", "group2", "status", "request", "simulation"
SELECT "percentiles50" FROM "gatling" WHERE "request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ok' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "count" FROM "gatling" WHERE "request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ok' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "count" FROM "gatling" WHERE "request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ko' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "count" FROM "gatling" WHERE "request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ok' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "count" FROM "gatling" WHERE "request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ko' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "percentiles95" FROM "gatling" WHERE "request" <> 'allRequests' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request"

panels.description: Чтобы оценить количество операций, которые были выполнены на каждый момент времени. Количество объектов, которые были созданы. Или количество записей в логе, об успешном выполнении операции, которые стоит ожидать.
panels.title: Individual Request count (ok/pass statuses)

panels.description: Чтобы оценить количество событий в логе ошибок, которые стоит ожидать. Чтобы попробовать скоррелировать графики ошибок по запросам с графиками текстов ошибок на стороне системы
panels.title: Individual Request count (fail/error statuses)

title: Gatling Report
